desc: This family operated business has come from humble beginnings. Nestled in the heart of the Livermore Valley, Healthy Coffee Lifestyles opened it’s doors in 1989 with the most innovative and highest quality coffee roasting in our industry today.

layout.text: 100% Organic AA Arabica Single Origin Coffee, from Private Estates farms around the world. Proprietary patented and scientific heat exchanger technology that produces a true lower-acidic coffee.
